item.description:
MIT Stata Center (Bldg 32), Room 124
Cambridge, 5 minute walk from Kendall/MIT on the Red Line

Join the Massachusetts Sierra Club and the MIT Recycling Working Group of Support Staff Issues for their monthly (Friday nite) Energy Movie Nights. Movies start at 6:30pm followed by a discussion. Free. This month's feature:

Oil on Ice: Save the Refuge, Save the World
With energy prices soaring, the debate over whether to open the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge to drilling has been pushed to the forefront of the debate over our energy future and the fate of our environment. Powerful political forces are working to take advantage of the current economic climate to "drill here, drill now," pushing candidates who were previously opposed to drilling to reconsider their positions.

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: Energy Film Night: Oil on Ice
